summary: Aggregates FastAPI router definitions that expose HTTP endpoints for managing core entities such as organizations, questions, quizzes, sessions, and session answers. Each router validates input, checks authentication tokens, interacts with the MongoDB data layer, and returns structured JSON responses with appropriate error handling.
business_intent: Provide a secure, RESTful API allowing client applications to create, retrieve, and update educational platform data—including organizations, quiz content, user sessions, and answers—facilitating seamless integration and data management.
